title: The Sentinel
text: The Sentinel is the city’s lone, immobile Diamond Ranker atop the Spire. The Sentinel is the linchpin of Orizon's defenses. Citizens believe the Sentinel watches over them, a sleepless guardian against the horrors of the Deep. The truth of the Sentinel's existence is known only to the Spire Authority—rumors persist that the Sentinel is not a person, but a corpse piloted by the city's AI.
image_prompt: A glowing figure sitting on a throne at the top of a tower, silent, powerful, overlooking the city.
